summary: A shady police detective becomes embroiled in a strange world of murder, sadism and madness after being assigned a murder investigation against a madman known only as "The Engineer".
cast: Craig Sheffer|Nicholas Turturro|James Remar|Doug Bradley|Nicholas Sadler|Noelle Evans|Lindsay Taylor|Matt George|Michael Shamus Wiles|Sasha Barrese|Kathryn Joosten|Jessica Elliot|Carmen Argenziano|Christopher Neiman|Christopher Kriesa|Brian Sostek|Thomas Crouch|J.B. Gaynor|Timothy 'TJ' James Driscoll|Coco Leigh|Ian Barford|Daniel Gavin|Paul Hayes|Evan Okada|Winifred Freedman|Michael Denney|Timothy Oman|Lindley Gardner|Cliff Cadaver|Ron Altamare|Rachel Currence|Darlene Levin|Maureen Sue Levin|Brad Blumenthal|Ray Miceli|Lynn Speier|Patricia Kara|Kazuhiro Yokoyama|Akihiro Noguchi|Mike J. Regan|Leigh Taylor-Young
title: Hellraiser: Inferno
